p.d: Asked to examine a mask, the archaeologist Roxane Delage is attacked and awakes half-naked in the living room of a house, with a man's body in the next room. Panic-stricken, she covers her tracks and flees. A few hours later, officers Combas and Maupin arrest her for murder. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2016) Screenplay: Isabel Sebastian, Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gal Cast: Julie de Bona (Roxane Delage), Sagamore Stévenin (Hugo Combas), Olivia Bonamy (Sabine Maupin), Thomas Jouannet (Alexis Delage), Jeanne Bournaud (Ines Ortiz), Thibault Vinçon (Pablo Ortiz), Olivier Claverie (Guy Marchepied), Bernard Lecoq (François Ortiz) Genre: drama
